snippet.title: PHOTON CUBE PV【EnglishVer】
snippet.description:
PHOTON CUBE is a unique puzzle game using light function.
Let's manipulate Ray-chan and move the band of light flowing on the stage to the exit by moving the arrangement of the cube!
What is necessary for clearing more than 50 different stages is just a little 'knowledge of light'. And infinite 'imagination'.
Welcome to the world of intellectual and wonderful PHOTON CUBE!
